item.description:
Happy Spring Everyone!!!

Isn't this weather FABULOUS?!! Velvet is happy to finally get some sunbathing into her busy schedule. Hope everyone is doing well.

We will hold out April meet up on Sunday, April 18th from 11:00am to 1:00pm. For those of you who will be attending for the first time, please check in at the front desk and be sure to bring the updated vaccine information for rabies, distemper and canine cough.

If anyone would like to schedule a grooming for after the meetup, please let me know ahead of time. My Sunday groomer leaves when she's done so I want to make sure she'll be available for you.

We still have room left in our Basic Obedience training class starting on Wednesday, April 7th at 6:00pm for anyone who's interested.

Please call me at 781.245.1237 if you have any questions, would like to enroll in training or wish to utilize any of out other services.

Looking forward to seeing you!

Agni
item.name: APRIL PUG MEET UP
